codepush.mandatoryUpdateMessage: You must update the app to work properly.
codepush.title: ¡Update available!

Sin Favoritos: MARK CONTENT AS FAVORITES SO THEY CAN APPEAR HERE
TextoAlerta: it's too late to visit this trail, we don't recommend you doing it now
Aviso Permisos: You need to allow requested permissions to see this screen
InfoHeaderSpecies: Some animals are easier to see than others, the key is in silence, in waiting for them and not chasing them. Never feed them. Plants are easier to photograph, please do not tear them.
InfoHeaderEmergency:
If you got lost, the map will help you find your way back. There is no telephone signal in the Park, the dots with an “i” on the map indicate places where you will find assistance.

If you are injured or cannot walk, ask someone to use this app to inform a park ranger of your situation: with the GPS button they can record your position, then take photos of the environment and what happened.
fire-alert-description: For climatic reasons, it is prohibited to make fire in the entire National Park.
